detail_desc: An old man peering through ancient tomes rests here.
long_desc: Your guildmaster stands here.

detail_desc: An older man wrapped in purple, long-flowing robes meditates here.
long_desc: Your guildmaster stands here.

detail_desc: A smaller man dressed in black robes stands here waiting to train you.
long_desc: Your guildmaster stands here.

detail_desc:
A small human dressed in black rests in the corner.  As you enter he grabs
a knife and throws it at you.  It lands in the wall next to your left ear.
'We will now begin', is all he says.
long_desc: Your guildmaster stands here.

detail_desc:
This Arabian beauty is obviously the daughter of some high ranking
official.  As you attempt to sneak a peek under her veil you notice
a small moon-shaped birthmark on her left cheek.
long_desc: A dark skinned, veiled woman greets you from behind the desk.

detail_desc: He looks distracted as he pours five drinks at once without error.
long_desc: An old withered man leans against the bar.

detail_desc:
You see the lead singer of the Lokettes lip synching to an old Zochan
tune.
long_desc: Brother John, lead singer for the Lokettes stands on stage.

detail_desc: A small skinny man rests here hoping to find a warm heart.
long_desc: A panhandler rests here.

detail_desc: A small skinny man rests here staring at your clothes.
long_desc: A panhandler rests here.

detail_desc: This poor soul seems down on his luck, perhaps you might spare a dime?
long_desc: A grubby beggar sits here in the filth.

detail_desc: You see a large man in a white apron covered in flour from head to toe.
long_desc: The baker stands here playing solitaire.

detail_desc: You see a half-elf sitting on a stool behind his counter.
long_desc: The shopkeeper stands here.

detail_desc: This small halfling seems adept at counting money.
long_desc: A banker stands here waiting to help you.

detail_desc:
This middle-aged man looks over you with disdain and quickly suggests a
new wardrobe.
long_desc: Ahkeem the tailor welcomes you to his store.

detail_desc: A tall slender woman stands before you smiling broadly.
long_desc: Vera the veggie lady beems as you look over her stand.

detail_desc:
This stocky dwarf has a mad glint in his eye as he twirls his clever
carelessly into the air.
long_desc: Butch the meatcutter stands here in his bloodied apron.

detail_desc:
Abdul returns your gaze with a steady eye.  You quickly glance away
under his cold stare and place your order.
long_desc: Abdul stands here, waiting to help you.

detail_desc: You see a small dwarf with a large hump on his left shoulder.
long_desc: Igor stands here doing... something.

detail_desc:
You see a happy weather-worn face whose lines suggest many years on
the open sea.  It is only through years of fishing that she is able
to withstand the smell that permeates the air.
long_desc: Cassandra stands proudly over her selection.

detail_desc:
A worried working dwarf stands here constantly making notes in his
book and looking at his watch.
long_desc: The foreman stands here screaming at the workers.

detail_desc: A large sweaty looking man doesn't even return your glance.
long_desc: A construction worker steadily works here.

detail_desc:
The statue made of solid marble depicts the mighty God defeating Siva
in magical combat.
long_desc: The statue of Brahman stands here.

detail_desc:
The statue of the High Lord of Destruction stands here beings attacked
by Brahman in magical combat.
long_desc: The statue of Siva stands here.

detail_desc: This statue looks like an enormous elephant.
long_desc: The statue of Indra stands here.

detail_desc: This is a statue of the God of Death.  It is covered with odd runes.
long_desc: The statue of Yama stands here.

detail_desc:
The statue of Surya, the God in charge of the Sun, almost glows
with a firey aura.
long_desc: The statue of Surya stands here.

detail_desc:
The statue of the Black Mother, Kali, is made of black marble and
is covered with silver runes.
long_desc: The statue of Kali stands here.

detail_desc:
The statue of Brihaspati, the God of Scholars and Knowledge is made
of a weathered marble.
long_desc: The statue of Brihaspati stands here.

detail_desc:
The statue of Puchan, God of Travellers, is covered with dust and worn
as if it had been dragged a long way down a dusty road.
long_desc: The statue of Puchan stands here.

detail_desc: This big and burly man grins at you as he draws his sword.
long_desc: Aziz the Human Canon stands here.

detail_desc: This man is lithe and has an evil smirk upon his face.
long_desc: Mustafah the Human Robber stands here.

detail_desc:
This female elf has dusky skin and black hair.  A combination you don't
see very often on elves.
long_desc: Fatima the Elven Invoker stands here.

detail_desc: This short stocky fellow has a chest the girth of a barrel.
long_desc: Kareem the Dwarven Mercenary stands here.

detail_desc:
This robust fellow returns your gaze with a smile, but something inside
tells you not to trust him very far.
long_desc: A nomad merchant looks you over.

detail_desc: The large half-orc quickly glances you over and returns to his duties.
long_desc: A bodyguard sizes you up.

detail_desc: This small child sees you looking at him and quickly looks away.
long_desc: A skinny kid wanders around.

detail_desc:
Although seemingly dull witted, this hulking mass carries the huge
crates from the boats like it was a box of lilies.
long_desc: A strong dockworker walks by moving crates.

detail_desc:
The city's taxcollextor walks from store to store collecting the
Sultan's fee for living in his grand city.
long_desc: A small man walks around scribbling in a notebook.
Gord the Rogue stand here.

detail_desc:
This large man does not seem to be surprised at your approach and
looks at you quizically.
long_desc: Chulainn the Knight stands here.

detail_desc: This man is dressed in long brown robes and has a penetrating gaze.
long_desc: Daghdha the Arch-Magi stands here.
Curley GreenLeaf stands here.

detail_desc:
This sad case may have been an evangelist in another lifetime. He is known
to stand on corners and accost passers-by with his doomsday preaching.
long_desc: A small grey-haired man walks around spouting gospel.

detail_desc: You see a small starved cat.
long_desc: A small harmless feline searches for food.

detail_desc: As you look up at this bird, you see the only thing it wants is a corpse.
long_desc: A vulture circles above you.

detail_desc: He seems intent on winning.
long_desc: An old man sits here playing chess.

detail_desc: The huge hulking mass rises as someone asks him a question.
long_desc: Lugh the Librarian sits behind a desk.

detail_desc: What you see before you is really a baby air elemental.
long_desc: The wind kicks up some dust.

detail_desc:
This is a creature with the upper torso of a beautiful woman, but the
lower body of a four-legged beast.  She licks her lips as she looks at
you greedily.
long_desc: A strange lamia stands here waiting for her next meal.

detail_desc: This man looks like he could use a lot of rest.
long_desc: A raggety dervish stands here.

detail_desc: You see a large wealthy man in red robes smiling at you.
long_desc: The Sultan rests here on his throne.

detail_desc:
You see a dark skinned beauty, wearing almost transparent silks and 
light blue veil.  Her loyalty to the Sultan is unwavering.
long_desc: A lovely, veiled harem girl stands here.

detail_desc:
You see a pathetic soul lying here.  Probably some ex-nobleman that has
fallen out of grace with the Sultan.
long_desc: The Jailer sleeps here, snoring loudly.

detail_desc:
You see a large man whose only duty is to protect the harem.  He has been
castrated for the ladies' safety.
long_desc: A eunich stands here watching over the girls.

detail_desc:
You see the most beautiful Arabian girl that has ever meet your eyes.
Too bad she is about to kill you.
long_desc: Nichole, the Sultan's favorite girl rests on a mound of pillows.

detail_desc: You see the all-knowing Allah.
long_desc: Allah is here.

detail_desc: This man looks like a mage/warrior, I wouldn't mess with him.
long_desc: The Guard for the Guild of Mages stand here.

detail_desc: This man looks like a cleric/warrior, I wouldn't mess with him.
long_desc: The Guard for the Guild of Clerics stands here.

detail_desc: The man looks like Conan's cousin, I wouldn't mess with him.
long_desc: The Guard for the Guild of Warriors stands here.

detail_desc:
You see a thief dressed all in black, he quickly stands as you
enter and steps to bar your way.  You notice his hands resting
on two sheathes.
long_desc: The Guard for the Guild of theives stands here.

detail_desc: You see a small boy running around the halls of the palace.
long_desc: A servant boy is here running errands.

detail_desc: You see a trained fighter, ready to help those in need.
long_desc: A guard stands here, protecting the innocent.

detail_desc: You see a trained fighter, ready to defend the city.
long_desc: A guard stands here, watching the gate.

detail_desc: You see a large man skilled in hunting and killing.
long_desc: The Chief of the Sultan's Guard stands here.

detail_desc: You see an assassin down on his luck looking to be freelanced out.
long_desc: A mercenary stands here waiting for a job.

detail_desc:
You see the shipwright of New Thalos, waiting to make someone a boat.  He
beams a smile at you through his beard as you walk in.
long_desc: An old captain rests here carving on a stick.

detail_desc:
You see a large human, dripping in sweat, standing before you.  He takes
a break from his swealtering work to bid you welcome.
long_desc: The blacksmith stands here pumping air into his fire.

detail_desc: You see one of the fine Arabian beasts known about the land.
long_desc: A horse stands here.

detail_desc:
You see a small, rotund man, with a strange object around his neck and
a nose guard.  He is looking at a small map that he seems to be holding
upside down.
long_desc: A tourist stands here looking lost.

detail_desc: You see a large ray with sharp fangs and a barbed tail.
long_desc: A very large ray with a wicked looking tail swims here.

detail_desc: A grey-brown reptillian creature with amber eyes stands before you.
long_desc: The cryohydra stands here.

detail_desc: A huge lizard like reptile with horns like a minotaur.
long_desc: the minotaur lizard stands here.

detail_desc: A large two-headed hound barks at you vicously.
long_desc: The death dog stands here.

detail_desc: A large fierce dapple skinned lion glares at you.
long_desc: The spotted lion stands here.

detail_desc: You see a large snake-like reptile with more than a dozen legs.
long_desc: A behir slithers on the ground.

detail_desc:
The chimera is still a mystery, better left unexplored.  This creature
has the hindquarters of a goat, the forepaws of a lion and the body of
a red dragon.
long_desc: A creature with three heads: lion, goat, and dragon stands here.

detail_desc:
A beautiful creature with the body of a serpent and feathered wings the
colour of the rainbow.
long_desc: A couatl hovers here.

detail_desc: It is a hornet, what else can be said?
long_desc: The giant hornet hovers here.

detail_desc:
A magnificant winged steed, this horse looks much like the Arabian
thoroughbreds you have seen in stables.
long_desc: The pegasus stands here, flexing its wings.

detail_desc:
You see a very healthy female dressed in black, with long flowing
hair to match her outfit.
long_desc: Elriva stands here mixing a love potion.

detail_desc: You see a powerful but slighty insane mage.
long_desc: Braheem stands here talking to the walls.

detail_desc: He does NOT look real happy that you have disturbed him.
long_desc: The high priest rests here meditating, well he WAS meditating.

detail_desc:
You see one of the Royal Guards of New Thalos who seems to have undergone
some heavy training.
long_desc: An Elite Royal Guard stands here smiling happily.

detail_desc:
You see a really big guy here who seems to have lost an eye in one manner
or another.
long_desc: A large half-orc with a patch over one eye pours beer behind the counter.

detail_desc:
You see a small hobbit with his feet kicked up on his desk waiting for
some sucker, uhm, customer to walk in his store.
long_desc: Stitch, the leather dude reclines in his chair.

detail_desc:
A young elf stands here in dirt covered overalls.  He seems to be
weeding his garden.
long_desc: A small elf stands here tending the garden.

detail_desc:
You see the largest horse you have ever seen before.  Standing 10'
at the shoulder it breathes flame from his nostrils and leaps to
attack you.
long_desc: A large horse, black as night, stands here.

detail_desc:
You see a half wolf, half human beast wearing a glove with long thin
blades on it.
long_desc: A large wolf like creature leaps out from the darkness.

detail_desc: Boy is she ugly.
long_desc: You see an incredibly life-like painting of the Sultan's mother.

detail_desc: You see a chubby rabbit dressed in his best suit.
long_desc: The Mayor of New Thalos stands here.

detail_desc: You see a very large human who seems to taste everything he makes.
long_desc: The chef stands here making dinner.
